node.detail_zh: 患者於灣仔道金陵會工作，無外遊記錄，9 月 2 日出現症狀，曾到私人診所求診，9 月 4 日於彩雲社區中心接受全民檢測後確診。患者所工作餐廳於 7 月中已暫停營業，餐廳準備進行大清潔後重開，故要求員工於復工前先做檢測。
node.detail_en: The patient works in Jin Lin Palace on Wan Chai road, has no recent travel history, and developed symptoms on Sept 2. He had visited a private clinic for consultation. On Sept 4, he tested positive through the Universal Community Testing Programme at the testing centre in Home Affairs Department Choi Wan Estate Community Centre, Ngau Chi Wan. The restaurant the patient worked at has been temporarily closed since mid-July. The restaurant planned to reopen after deep cleaning and requested employees to get tested before returning to work.

node.location_en: Kai Fai House, Choi Wan (II) Estate
